title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 16 April 2014 - XWiki
content:

11:30 <gdelhumeau> /me messages are not archived by the xwikibot  
12:12 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
13:03 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
13:05 <spu7nic> has quit  
13:16 <spu7nic> has joined #xwiki  
13:24 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
14:13 <vmassol> :)  
14:14 <vmassol> mflorea: isn't this an issue for 5.4.4 (the fact that the solr index needs to be recreated when you upgrade from 5.4.x to 5.4.4)?  
14:14 <vmassol> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-10225  
14:14 <vmassol> also I don't see it mentioned in http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotesXWiki544  
14:14 <vmassol> is that normal?  
14:14 <vmassol> (but it's mentioned in the RN for 6.0RC1)  
14:16 <mflorea> I'll mention in 5.4.4RN  
14:16 <tmortagne> we really need some minimal kind of automated migration of solr configuration (at least some way to wipe it when anything changed)  
14:16 <vmassol> does it break anything if the user doesn't reindex?  
14:16 <vmassol> (asking because adding this in a bugfix release is not ideal )  
14:16 <vmassol> (this = schema change)  
14:17 <mflorea> this schema change fixes an important bug  
14:17 <mflorea> and deleting the solr folder is not a big deal  
14:18 <vmassol> I disagree but I don't have a better solution ;)  
14:18 <vmassol> (except automatic migration)  
14:21 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
14:26 <tmortagne> has quit  
14:44 <silviar> has joined #xwiki  
14:44 <silviar> has quit  
14:59 <vmassol> mflorea: question for you  
15:00 <vmassol> is it normal that when you try to uninstall the Blog app, it asks you to remove Main.WebHome and XWiki.XWikiServerXwiki? :)  
15:00 <vmassol> (you should try it, it's fun :))  
15:01 <vmassol> (it's maybe a question more for thomas but he's left)  
15:01 <vmassol> looks like a bug to me  
15:03 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
15:04 <vmassol> mflorea: v  
15:04 <vmassol> oops  
15:04 <vmassol> https://www.evernote.com/shard/s119/sh/75f47249-2f57-4bbe-9718-ade58eaeae3d/e7bb7893c70c264a3641c42b31724eb8  
15:06 <vmassol> (I'm on master)  
15:08 <vmassol> has quit  
15:10 <mflorea> vmassol: http://i.imgur.com/hKTyhf8.png?1  
15:12 <mflorea> vmassol: if A depends on B (which means A cannot work without B), and you uninstall B then A is uninstall too.  
15:19 <Slashman\_> has joined #xwiki  
15:22 <Slashman> has quit  
15:32 <spu7nic> has quit  
15:44 <gdelhumeau> we do not have functionnal tests for appwithinminutes?  
15:46 <ClemensR> well, there are a lot of page objects .. so the test s should be somehwere ...  
15:47 <gdelhumeau> It seems the page objects are not use anywhere  
15:47 <gdelhumeau> \*used  
15:47 <ClemensR> them are in xwiki-enterprise/xwiki-enterprise-test/xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/src/test/it/org/xwiki/test/ui/appwithinminutes  
15:47 <ClemensR> in the "legacy locations", as I have been told  
15:47 <gdelhumeau> ok thx  
15:47 <gdelhumeau> I have only looked on platform  
15:48 <ClemensR> someone should more them into xwiki-platform ... I did the same with the few watchlist tests and it needed nearly a day till finished ...
